name: vscodefiletreecopy
description: A way to copy the file tree and contents of a vscode project

copyFileStructure.allowedExtensions.description: If specified, only files with these extensions are included. Example: [".js", ".ts"]

copyFileStructure.excludedDirectories.description: Glob patterns of directories to exclude.

copyFileStructure.excludedFiles.description: Glob patterns of files to exclude.

copyFileStructure.maxFileSizeKB.description: Maximum allowed file size in kilobytes. Files larger than this will be skipped. 0 means no limit.

copyFileStructure.maxFileContentLength.description: Maximum number of characters per file. If exceeded, content will be truncated. 0 means no limit.

copyFileStructure.maxDepth.description: Maximum depth of directories to traverse. 0 means no limit.
